attributes.additional_details: Mental Health should be taught about in every secondary school within England and Wales as there is nothing that is done about Mental within the state schools. Especially Children are felling the effects of Mental Health before they are being taught about it.  This change should happen for the better of the world rather than the worst for the children who are going through Mental Heath.
attributes.background: Mental health is a very important part of my life - I feel that it does not get taught enough within Public school.
